entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH, Peawanuck
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:24 p.m. EDT Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 40%
